explanation: [0-0] On a football field, a player in green is running with a player in red in the distance. The words "Wait for King" are displayed on the screen, followed by a grinning-with-sweat emoji.

[0-5] Suddenly, a football flies in from above, and the player in green kicks it towards the goal. The ball passes through several players in red, hitting the goalkeeper in the head. The ball then bounces off the goalkeeper and out of the goal, after which the player in green swiftly positions himself with his back to the goalkeeper, trapping him inside the goal. Simultaneously, a player in red is standing beside the goalpost.

[5-15] The player in red next to the goalpost then kicks the rebounded ball away and proceeds to walk towards the center of the field. Subsequently, the player in green opens his arms and also walks towards the center of the field. Meanwhile, the phrase "Does this goal count?" appears on the screen, followed by a grimacing emoji.
